column2: During the PAST 30 days, what BRAND of CIGAR did you smoke MOST OFTEN? ENTER CODE FOR BRAND (1-15).  ENTER 15 for OTHER BRAND NOT ON THE LIST
column9: IF indicates “need to prompt with Follow-Up question Q2,” ask Q2 after asking main question Q1. Follow-up prompt appears for certain brands that produce regular and little cigars.
column17: 1 = Al Capone (makes regular and little/small cigars)
column19: 3 = Black & Milds (makes regular and cigarillo-medium size cigars) (in Spanish use “medium size cigars “ instead of the word “cigarillo” here) with plastic hard filters)
column25: 9 = King Edward( makes  regular and little/small cigars)
column30: 14 = Swisher Sweet*  (makes regular and little/small cigars)

column2: Is that a regular or little cigar? Little cigars are cigarette size with a filter.
During the past 30 days, did you USUALLY smoke flavored cigars? By flavored we mean fruit, candy, alcohol, clove or any other flavorings.
